original: de ltar byas pas nus pa gsum nges par 'thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas nus pa gsum nges par 'thob bo //
translated: By doing so, one will definitely attain the three powers.

original: ji srid du nus pa gsum ma thob kyi bar la ni /
analyzed: ji srid du nus pa gsum ma thob kyi bar la ni /
translated: Until one attains the three powers,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig la 'jol nyog tu sgom du rung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig la 'jol nyog tu sgom du rung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: it is not suitable to meditate on the complete stage in a haphazard manner.

original: gnas pa dag pas bslab par bya ba'i rim pa ni /
analyzed: gnas pa dag pas bslab par bya ba'i rim pa ni /
translated: The sequence of training through purifying the stages is as follows.

original: thun dang po tsam ma yin pas nyin zhag phrugs gcig la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin thun gcig bsgom ste //
analyzed: thun dang po tsam ma yin pas nyin zhag phrugs gcig la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin thun gcig bsgom ste //
translated: Since it is not just the first session, one should meditate on the samādhi of the creation stage in a single session for an entire day.

original: de nas kha bshal khrus byas la /
analyzed: de nas kha bshal khrus byas la /
translated: Then, rinse the mouth and wash.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni /
translated: The meditation of the completion stage is as follows:🔽Having arranged one’s body in any comfortable position on a comfortable seat, on one’s tongue, a blue vajra arises from hūṃ, surrounded by many hundreds of light rays.

original: stan bde ba'i steng du lus ji ltar rigs pas bcos la bdag nyid kyi lce'i steng du h'um las rdo rje sngon po 'od zer brgya phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba de'i mtha' mar yi dam gyi sngags kyi phreng bas g-yas su bskor bas /🔽de'i phyi rim du a'a li g-yon skor /🔽de'i phyi rim du ni k'a @90a * //
analyzed: stan bde ba'i steng du lus ji ltar rigs pas bcos la bdag nyid kyi lce'i steng du h'um las rdo rje sngon po 'od zer brgya phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba de'i mtha' mar yi dam gyi sngags kyi phreng bas g-yas su bskor bas / de'i phyi rim du a'a li g-yon skor / de'i phyi rim du ni k'a @90a * //
translated: The garland of the mantra of the pledged deity encircles it to the right.🔽The garland of ākāra encircles it to the left.

original: li'i phreng ba g-yas skor /🔽de ltar phreng ba gsum po de la dmigs la sems phab ste gnas pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi nyes pa gsum bcom /
analyzed: li'i phreng ba g-yas skor / de ltar phreng ba gsum po de la dmigs la sems phab ste gnas pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi nyes pa gsum bcom /
translated: The garland of ṇkāra encircles it to the right.🔽Focusing on those three garlands, the mind is settled.

original: de nyid bcom pas phreng ba dang po la dmigs pas /
analyzed: de nyid bcom pas phreng ba dang po la dmigs pas /
translated: Since the three faults of body, voice, and mind are conquered, by focusing on the first garland, the faults of the body are conquered.

original: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sprul sku thob la /
analyzed: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sprul sku thob la /
translated: You will attain the nirmanakaya of Vajra Vidarana.🔽🔽

original: gnyis pas longs sku thob /
analyzed: gnyis pas longs sku thob /
translated: By the second, you attain the enjoyment body.

original: gsum pas chos sku thob bo //
analyzed: gsum pas chos sku thob bo //
translated: By the third, you attain the truth body.

original: h'um gi 'od zer la dmigs pas sku gsum dbyer mi phyed pa dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku thob pa'o //
analyzed: h'um gi 'od zer la dmigs pas sku gsum dbyer mi phyed pa dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku thob pa'o //
translated: By visualizing the light rays of the HŪṂ, you attain the body of the glorious Vajravidāraṇa, the three bodies inseparable.

original: de yang dmigs pa ji ltar dmigs na dang po stong pa'i ngang las h'um zhes bsrung ba bya /
analyzed: de yang dmigs pa ji ltar dmigs na dang po stong pa'i ngang las h'um zhes bsrung ba bya /
translated: How do you visualize? First, from within emptiness, say HŪṂ and perform the protection.

original: gnyis pa lus ngag gi sdig pa sbyor ba'i don du /
analyzed: gnyis pa lus ngag gi sdig pa sbyor ba'i don du /
translated: Second, in order to purify the sins of body and speech,

original: mchod pa stod bshags pa bya /
analyzed: mchod pa stod bshags pa bya /
translated: make offerings and confess sins.

original: gsum pa rdzogs pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul pa dang / chu gtor dang tsha tsha gdab pa dang / chu sbyin gtang /
analyzed: gsum pa rdzogs pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul pa dang / chu gtor dang tsha tsha gdab pa dang / chu sbyin gtang /
translated: Third, in order to complete the practice, emanate the mandala circle, perform the water offering, set up the cairn, and give the water gift.

original: bzhi pa chos nyid zab mo 'jol nyog tu spyod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bzhi pa chos nyid zab mo 'jol nyog tu spyod pa'i phyir /
translated: Fourth, in order to practice the profound reality in a relaxed way,

original: phreng ba dang po la rmi lam lta bur dmigs /
analyzed: phreng ba dang po la rmi lam lta bur dmigs /
translated: on the first rosary visualize like a dream.

original: gnyis pa la chu zla lta bur dmigs /
analyzed: gnyis pa la chu zla lta bur dmigs /
translated: On the second, visualize like a water moon.

original: gsum ba la nam mkha' lta bur dmigs /
analyzed: gsum ba la nam mkha' lta bur dmigs /
translated: On the third, visualize like space.

original: h'um la dmigs pa gnyis pa'i cha la cir yang ma grub par dmigs so //
analyzed: h'um la dmigs pa gnyis pa'i cha la cir yang ma grub par dmigs so //
translated: In the second part of the visualization of hūṃ, visualize that it does not exist as anything at all.

original: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba'i don yin /
analyzed: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba'i don yin /
translated: This is the meaning of the profound domain of the buddhas.

original: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba /
translated: This is called “concentration that abides in sound.”

original: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of the great master Śrī Dīpaṃkara Bhadra is complete.
